timeline.bodyText: Please delete the variables from strings-de and put them into string.xml
timeline.author: BeinhAlex
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1005,12 +999,12 @@ Die vorangegangene, veraltete Version unserer Datenschutzrichtlinie (2.0) finden
     <string name="brick_change_variable">Ändere Variable</string>
     <string name="brick_write_variable_on_device">Variable auf Gerät schreiben</string>
     <string name="brick_read_variable_from_device">Variable von Gerät lesen</string>
-    <string name="brick_write_variable_to_file_top">Schreibe Variable</string>
-    <string name="brick_write_variable_to_file_bottom">Zur Datei</string>
-    <string name="brick_write_variable_to_file_default_value">Variable.txt</string>
-    <string name="brick_write_variable_to_file_success">"Daten erfolgreich in %1$s geschrieben"</string>
-    <string name="brick_read_variable_from_file_top">Lese Variable</string>
-    <string name="brick_read_variable_from_file_center">Aus Datei</string>
